snippet.textDisplay: One of the best games ever made. As somebody who usually loses interest in adventure games after about 10-20 hours and thus never beats them, by time I finished this game after about 70 hours I was genuinely upset that it was over so soon.

snippet.textDisplay: Its main flaw, in my opinion, is that not many people know much of anything about Japanese mythology. It's something of a niche game in that regard. That's not to say those with no knowledge of the subject can't get into it. *cough* Chuggaaconroy *cough*
snippet.textOriginal: Its main flaw, in my opinion, is that not many people know much of anything about Japanese mythology. It's something of a niche game in that regard. That's not to say those with no knowledge of the subject can't get into it. *cough* Chuggaaconroy *cough*

snippet.textDisplay: Just goes to show that commercial success is meaningless in regards to a game's greatness.

snippet.textDisplay:
Such a beautiful game.
It was an under-appreciated masterpiece, even after it was ported to the Wii as well. One of the only games my girlfriend watched me play, just because it was so pretty.  The humour was also really funny.  I know I laughed out loud a few times while playing it.
The DS one (Okamiden) was a gem in its own right.  With fantastic visuals and spot on music.
Hey Capcom, how about a sequel??!?!
snippet.textOriginal:
Such a beautiful game.
It was an under-appreciated masterpiece, even after it was ported to the Wii as well. One of the only games my girlfriend watched me play, just because it was so pretty.  The humour was also really funny.  I know I laughed out loud a few times while playing it.
The DS one (Okamiden) was a gem in its own right.  With fantastic visuals and spot on music.
Hey Capcom, how about a sequel??!?!

snippet.textDisplay:
I've had this game sitting on my table for quite some time now, opened but not played. Got it for like $10 a while back, but I've been playing other games that have recently been coming out.

After hearing this, I'm thinking maybe I should change that.

Also, parts of this song remind me of the Airship Theme from FFVI, and others remind me of the Main Theme from Chrono Trigger. Has anyone else noticed that?
snippet.textOriginal:

snippet.textDisplay: @gunslingerfry To me, Okami = Zelda in terms of awesomeness and preference, I can't possibly have one without missing the other, but to me, the moment that struck me about the two being similar was when you were a wolf in front of a broken bridge with a fairy-like partner.
snippet.textOriginal: @gunslingerfry To me, Okami = Zelda in terms of awesomeness and preference, I can't possibly have one without missing the other, but to me, the moment that struck me about the two being similar was when you were a wolf in front of a broken bridge with a fairy-like partner.

snippet.textDisplay: Such a huge area to explore, but that was a great thing. I love this theme, and it's great to run around with flowers in your wake. Then all of a sudden you run into a demon scroll and have to fight, only to be returned to a lush coast and beautiful music.
snippet.textOriginal: Such a huge area to explore, but that was a great thing. I love this theme, and it's great to run around with flowers in your wake. Then all of a sudden you run into a demon scroll and have to fight, only to be returned to a lush coast and beautiful music.

snippet.textDisplay: Men,,, Okami is simply one of the best games this decade offered to us,,,, real art, real fun,,,real emotions,,,, inovative, hard, but not impossible, epic,,,, when everybody talks about "real": gears of war, god fo war, call of duty, Okmai enters and makes us remember that, the importan is not how "real" a game is: is what makes us feel,,, Okami forever!!!!!!

snippet.textDisplay:
I played Okami after playing TP, but I agree, they're almost different takes on the same game.
In both, you play as wolves, and in both, you cleanse or purify lands taken over by darkness.
snippet.textOriginal:
I played Okami after playing TP, but I agree, they're almost different takes on the same game.
